title: СВ-шоу
overview: SV-show is a unique show that you can watch on 1+1 TV channel. In it, all genres are mixed in an unusual proportion: humorous, dance, and talk shows. In each issue of the project, it is visited by famous Ukrainian personalities. In the studio, which is stylized as a sleeping car, guests of the project talk with the host and tell their secrets. It is worth noting that the project was led by none other than Verka Serdyuchka or Andriy Danylko.
